Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor

Provides classes for the Style Editor.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationComboBox
    A customized combo box for displaying annotations.
    ProxiableDoubleSpinner  
    ScoreToOpacityMapperListItem
    This class represents a score to opacity property mapper as a list item.
    ScoreToOpacityPanel
    The score to opacity panel.
    SlotSelectionDialog
    This dialog is used when the user needs to select a slot number.
    StyleColoredButton
    A button that displays a solid color in the space that the JButton it is extending would normally take up.
    StyleEditorFrame
    The main frame of GView's Style Editor.
    StyleEditorToolBar
    The tool bar for the Style Editor.
    StyleEditorTree
    The style editor tree used in the StyleEditorFrame.
    StyleEditorTreeComboBox
    A customized combo box for style editor trees.
    StyleEditorTreeRenderer
    Controls how to render the the tree.
    StyleEditorUtility
    Contains many constants, methods and other utility for the style editor.
    StyleMenu
    The edit menu class.
    StyleNameManager  
    TreeRightClickMenu
    The right click menu for the StyleTree.
    TriStateCheckBox
    This class extends the JCheckBox and implements custom tri-state checkbox with custom ImageIcons for all checkbox states.
    UnknownMapperListItem
    This class represents a unknown mapper list item.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StyleEditorUtility.ConversionException
    Custom exception class.

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor Description
